title: Whats with the Arcade Poro Icon

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: For some reason the Arcade Poro Icon seems to have lost its corners and I dont believe this to be on purpose.  If it is on purpose I ask that it is changed back with the border as I think it looks really good with the border.

replies.body: This is exactly what I'm saying, now it looks god awful without the rainbow

Hey Trendamirror! 

This isn't on purpose! The icon was accidentally reverted to a prior iteration. From what I understand, we're looking to go back to a similar square design. :)

https://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d5/ProfileIcon2094.png

there's a new version of it on the PBE with a more colorful background and the borders disappeared, i like it now

Am I the only one who really loathes the updated version of this icon?? I legit spent 15 bucks JUST to get the original icon, the contrast was SO much better and I LOVED the rainbow border. I feel like Riot basically just spit in my face and said "thanks for the fifteen bucks, now you don't get to fully enjoy what you paid for." 

Actually pretty annoyed at this. Can we a least get the _option_ for black background with rainbow border/rainbow background with no border? This one just feels so much harsher on the eyes...

Oh shit if it gets reverted I'll definitely switch back. Actually missed out on my last daily quest because I forgot to use the icon. It just looked so bad after the change I swapped to something else.
**_H Y P E    I N T E N S I F I E S_**
It is fine on the forums but in game it is all messed up.
I think they changed it to fit when in lobby. Since it had a square border, it looked strange in the circle. I assume that's what happened; looks cool, but I still liked the full thing better.
